hist3([0.035128,0.0368594;-0.0239615,-0.00100103;0.0556141,-0.0140141;0.0252902,-0.0277115;-0.0273779,0.0204587;0.0485962,0.0759381;-0.0680386,-0.00533777;0.00815945,0.015942;0.017539,0.0176814;0.0504904,-0.00708358;]);set(gcf,'renderer','opengl'); set(get(gca,'child'),'FaceColor','interp','CDataMode','auto'); title("3D Histogram");
